title: New runes and sustain supports
body: Hey, looking at the new runes, does it seem to anyone else that sustain supports are really not getting much compared to every other class? Could we please get a little something else other than just being able to send a shield based on the level to our allies?

replies.body: Well resolve and sorcery each have a shielding keystone and resolve has a healing increase rune as well. Mana is usually also a gate for healers, and inspiration and sorcery each offer runes which alleviate that.

> [{quoted}](name=Tenth Leper,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gPuPgTA9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-05T21:04:54.068+0000)
>
> Well resolve and sorcery each have a shielding keystone and resolve has a healing increase rune as well. Mana is usually also a gate for healers, and inspiration and sorcery each offer runes which alleviate that.

Another recommendation I might have that could be slightly unorthodox is Gathering Storm.  Since supports have little gold to buy AP in their items, it could be useful to have scaling AP from this Rune. particularly if the game goes late.
